isaacvetter commented on Issue #134

duplicate of ballot, negative and in-person issue #94

isaacvetter commented on Issue #134

Propose to fix as suggested in #94.

isaacvetter edited a comment on Issue #134

During conversation at the Montreal, May 2019 working group meeting, @RicardoQuintano, @wmaethner, @NiklasSvenzen and myself talked through this issue and would like to:

Propose to fix as suggested in #94.

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
